markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Dessiral |image = Portrait_Generic_Valian_Townie_Female_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Dessiral.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = [Príncipi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 8 |MIG = 14 |CON = 11 |DEX = 14 |PER = 14 |INT = 12 |RES = 12 |health = 116 |damage = 18-30 {{pierce}}{{slash}} |accuracy = 54 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 43 |fortitude = 46 |reflex = 67 |will = 49 |dr = 7 |crush dr = 5 |freeze dr = 5 |ability = [Fighting Spirit](/fightingSpiritDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Backstab](/backstabDeadfire/), [Crippling Strike](/cripplingStrikeDeadfire/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/), [Dirty Fighting](/dirtyFightingDeadfire/), [Finishing Blow](/finishingBlowDeadfire/), [Gouging Strike](/gougingStrike/), [Strike the Bell](/strikeTheBell/) |location = [Dunnage](/dunnage/), [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/) |quests = [Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp](/bountyLordAdmiralImp/)
[Bounty - Lady Epero](/bountyLadyEpero/)
[Bounty - Katrenn](/bountyKatrenn/)
[Bounty - Torkar](/bountyTorkar/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Hood (Deadfire){{!}}Hood |body = Mail Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Mail Armor |weapon1 = Fine Hunting Bow (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Hunting Bow |weapon2 = Rapier (Deadfire){{!}}Rapier |weapon2_offhand = Fine Dagger (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Dagger |internalname = NPC_DUN_Dessiral |guid = eed9560f-a9c9-486a-8c4d-6f7a030eed70 }} '''Dessiral''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Seemingly a Príncipi pirate handing out bounties, Dessiral is actually waging a private vendetta against the crew of ''The Firebrand'', a notorious Principi gang that surpassed even [Benweth](/benweth/) in brutality and savagery. Although the ship was sunk by Huana pirate hunters and the captain slain, she wants the whole crew sent to the Wheel. The reason? They convinced her sister to come with them, live a life of piracy, condemning her to death at the hands of the pirate hunters. She still remembers Daneia, her wildness from the moment she was born, to her tendency to chase bad ends whenever she could. The Firebrand ended her - and Dessiral is keen on having her vengeance. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp](/bountyLordAdmiralImp/) * [Bounty - Lady Epero](/bountyLadyEpero/) * [Bounty - Katrenn](/bountyKatrenn/) * [Bounty - Torkar](/bountyTorkar/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * She gives you all four targets to take down at once. Each of the targets will also have a piece of a map, leading to the [Drowned Barrows](/drownedBarrows/). * Collect all map fragments, then examine one of the fragments to assemble the completed [Captain Henqua's Treasure Map](/captainHenquasTreasureMap/). The fragments are as follows: ** [Lord Admiral Imp's Map Fragment](/lordAdmiralImpsMapFragment/) ** [Lady Epero's Map Fragment](/ladyEperosMapFragment/) ** [Katrenn's Map Fragment](/katrennsMapFragment/) ** [Torkar's Map Fragment](/torkarsMapFragment/) ## Trivia * The location of Dessiral's conversation dialogue in the game directory indicates that at some point she may have been located in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/), [Neketaka](/neketaka/). [Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Dessiral |image = Portrait_Generic_Valian_Townie_Female_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Dessiral.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = [[Príncipi sen Patrena]] |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 8 |MIG = 14 |CON = 11 |DEX = 14 |PER = 14 |INT = 12 |RES = 12 |health = 116 |damage = 18-30 {{pierce}}{{slash}} |accuracy = 54 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 43 |fortitude = 46 |reflex = 67 |will = 49 |dr = 7 |crush dr = 5 |freeze dr = 5 |ability = [[Fighting Spirit (Deadfire)|Fighting Spirit]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Backstab (Deadfire)|Backstab]], [[Crippling Strike (Deadfire)|Crippling Strike]], [[Escape (Deadfire)|Escape]], [[Dirty Fighting (Deadfire)|Dirty Fighting]], [[Finishing Blow (Deadfire)|Finishing Blow]], [[Gouging Strike]], [[Strike the Bell]] |location = [[Dunnage]], [[Radiant Court]] |quests = [[Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp]]
[[Bounty - Lady Epero]]
[[Bounty - Katrenn]]
[[Bounty - Torkar]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Hood (Deadfire){{!}}Hood |body = Mail Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Mail Armor |weapon1 = Fine Hunting Bow (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Hunting Bow |weapon2 = Rapier (Deadfire){{!}}Rapier |weapon2_offhand = Fine Dagger (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Dagger |internalname = NPC_DUN_Dessiral |guid = eed9560f-a9c9-486a-8c4d-6f7a030eed70 }} '''Dessiral''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Seemingly a Príncipi pirate handing out bounties, Dessiral is actually waging a private vendetta against the crew of ''The Firebrand'', a notorious Principi gang that surpassed even [[Benweth]] in brutality and savagery. Although the ship was sunk by Huana pirate hunters and the captain slain, she wants the whole crew sent to the Wheel. The reason? They convinced her sister to come with them, live a life of piracy, condemning her to death at the hands of the pirate hunters. She still remembers Daneia, her wildness from the moment she was born, to her tendency to chase bad ends whenever she could. The Firebrand ended her - and Dessiral is keen on having her vengeance. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = * [[Bounty - Lord Admiral Imp]] * [[Bounty - Lady Epero]] * [[Bounty - Katrenn]] * [[Bounty - Torkar]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * She gives you all four targets to take down at once. Each of the targets will also have a piece of a map, leading to the [[Drowned Barrows]]. * Collect all map fragments, then examine one of the fragments to assemble the completed [[Captain Henqua's Treasure Map]]. The fragments are as follows: ** [[Lord Admiral Imp's Map Fragment]] ** [[Lady Epero's Map Fragment]] ** [[Katrenn's Map Fragment]] ** [[Torkar's Map Fragment]] ==Trivia== * The location of Dessiral's conversation dialogue in the game directory indicates that at some point she may have been located in [[Queen's Berth]], [[Neketaka]]. title: Dessiral
